sermons.title: (Blood Covenant) The Mark of God or The Mark of the Beast - 1
(Dominican Republic) The Great and Final Apostasy
(Godly Home) Part 22 - Where are the Men
sermons.description: "The challenge of the hour is for leadership in the home," says Denny Kenaston.  Who will rise to the challenge?  Brother Denny sounds a clarion call to the men to rise up from their apathy and respond to the call of God to be godly husbands and fathers.

sermons.title: (In The Word) 16 - The Adversary In The Church
sermons.description: Milton Green shares a very strong penetrating message about the state of the church in the modern day. The devil and the powers of darkness have been having much control and infiltration into the church in the modern day. A much needed message to hear of things to come.

sermons.title: (Men Who Met God): Ezekiel - You Must Meet God
(Missions Conference Shoals) - Part 3
sermons.description: A confronting word on true salvation and genuine conversion. Are you walking a life where the discipline of the Lord is evident? Has the powerful hand of God reached down and changed your heart? For some, it is an encouraging message of the intimate walk on the Narrow Way. But for others, it may cause you to truly examine the path you are on.

sermons.title: (The Power of the Holy Spirit - 1) The Breath of God
sermons.description: Many Christians today live a life under the law, like rowing a boat requiring a lot of effort, but life in the Holy Spirit is like a sailing boat empowered by a mighty wind.  Brother Zac shows what a glorious life is available to every believer made possible by another Helper who is exactly like the first Helper--Jesus.  In a day when there is so many counterfeits and so much confusion about the Holy Spirit, Zac shows what God's Word says we should expect when He breathes upon us.

sermons.title: (True Disciple Conference) Regeneration - Ezekiel 36
sermons.description: Why are vast sums of money spent trying to retain converts and get them to grow? asks Mr Washer. Because we’ve lost sight of the doctrines of salvation. This urgent message is a Biblical exposition of salvation and regeneration, which also defends both the honour of God and the unity of the true church. Men and women are going to hell for want of the preaching of this message, he says. It's no wonder, then, that he speaks with such passion.  (96 minutes)

sermons.title: (Worship - Part 2): God's Great Purpose in Redemption
sermons.description: This is the second of five sermons on worshipping God by AW Tozer. Mr. Tozer speaks on God's great purpose in redeeming mankind. The purpose is so that we may once again worship God as we were made to do. He then gives basic guidelines to helping condition our heart to worship God. These are boundless confidence in the character of God, admiration of God, fascination with God, and adoration of God.

sermons.title: 61. What is forbidden in the fourth commandment?
83. Are all transgressions of the law equally heinous?
A Building
sermons.description: Dr. Thompson discusses the resurrection, and how the way we live our lives each day is having a direct impact on the type of body we will receive when we are raised on that day. He discusses the reasons why God has started us out in this body, and the purpose of the new body we will receive. (1 hour 18 minutes).

sermons.title: A Reproach Among The Heathen
sermons.description: This is a message about how the visual Christian today has made a mockery out of God and how in turn God has made us a reproach among the heathens.  The text begins in Ezekiel 36:21.  But in the end God will bring those that do these things down and God will sanctify (honor) His great name.

sermons.title: A River of Life
sermons.description: Art insists that the waters of life flowing from the Throne are available here and now for those who are yielded to that Throne and to that Lordship. As believers, why are so few of us accessing that life? Could it be we are not yielded to the totality of that Lordship?

sermons.title: Americas Last Days - Part 1
sermons.description: This is a heavy message about what is happening to America in these last days.  But stick with the message until the end and you will hear the great news for those that endure until the end.  This is a classic David Wilkerson prophetic message.

sermons.title: Americas Last Days - Part 2
sermons.description: This is a heavy message about what is happening to America in these last days.  But stick with the message until the end and you will hear the great news for those that endure until the end.  This is a classic David Wilkerson prophetic message.

sermons.title: Arrogant, Overfed, and Unconcerned
sermons.description: "Now this was the sin of your sister Sodom: She and her daughters were arrogant, overfed and unconcerned; they did not help the poor and needy. They were haughty and did detestable things before me. Therefore I did away with them as you have seen" Ezekiel 16:49. Jackie gives a short, deep and challenging call to go and minister to the poor with a broken heart. Her message is followed by personal testimonies. The recording ends in weeping over the hardness of our hearts and for the poor. Real ministry is to show people the Lord of the Word: "They will know what He is like by what you are like. So you live it with your life and they will read you like an epistle." Whenever the destitute cry out, God will respond by sending a person, and it could be you. God works through people. Jackie also points out that the poor don't need training in evangelism, as evangelism is simply "one poor man telling another poor man where to find bread".

sermons.title: Being Made Trees of Life
sermons.description: Dr. Thompson says once we hit Pentecost, the Holy Spirit has two main purposes in our life: one is to give us power to witness & minister, and the other is to give us victory over the sin in our life. He discusses in great detail the general progression of growth in a Christian’s life, as typified by the depths of water detailed in Ezekiel 47. This sermon focuses on “water to the loins”, which he says represents the struggles to put our own will to death, and shift toward God’s will in our daily life. (59 minutes 14 seconds)

sermons.title: Breaking the Bondage of an Ungodly Heritage
Can These Bones Live?
sermons.description: You may have started out in life full of strength with a heart full of your own ideas. Today you find yourself weak and hopeless. The good news is that Godâ€™s love can reach you in your weakness and His Holy spirit can empower you to rise up out of the wounds of your past into a brand new life.

sermons.title: Changed Into Christ's Image #6
sermons.description: Dr. Thompson begins by discussing the fact that Jesus lives in the fire of God’s presence, and that if we are to be with Jesus where He is (John 14:3), we must be ready to live with Him in that Fire. Once we have been prepared to dwell in that fire, and for that fire to dwell in us, we can then go out and minister to lost mankind, bringing that fire and that life to people – it will flow out of us and bring life and light. Dr. Thompson says that is our eternal purpose in Christ – to be priests of God in His Kingdom forever. He discusses the unique unity that Adam and Eve shared, and the similarities with the unity that Christ and the Church are to have. This sermon will challenge you to look at your relationship with God in whole new ways (that sounds cliché, but it is very true in this case).

sermons.title: Conference Call Atlanta - John Macgregor
sermons.description: John McGregor shares his heart passion for revival being the director of the Canadian Revival Fellowship group. He shares how ezekiel saw the glory of God come back to the temple! My desire is to see "the manifest presence of God" again in our communities and Churches. There is a great need for a move of God again.

sermons.title: Create in Me a New Heart
Dangerous Shepards
sermons.description: This message is best described as how to identify dangerous, self-seeking shepherds, as the Bible describes in the scriptures. Where is the recognition of the seriousness and soberness of the high calling of being a shepherd to the sheep of God? Too many take it lightly and the sheep are scattered and wounded as a result, and often destroyed.

sermons.title: Ezekiel 37
sermons.description: A Quote from the sermon by Paul Washer: Do you know what we need today? Preachers who are actually out there, where the dead are. Uncloistered men, who care nothing about religious accommodations, or ivory towers. They may use libraries, but they do not love them. They would rather stand out in the midst of a depraved humanity, and cry out thus saith the Lord, hear the Word of the Lord. We need to take this so called good theology, and get it out there where the dead are.

sermons.title: Ezekiel 37
sermons.description: A shocking key of interpretation and understanding for present Israel.  Her death must precede her resurrection.

sermons.title: God Said It, God Did It
Growing in the Grace of God #07 - The Holy Spirit Covenant Part 1
Growing in the Grace of God #08 - The Holy Spirit Covenant Part 2
Hell - Part 2
sermons.description: The main text for this message is in Ezekiel 22.  Wilkerson preaches on a message that makes most rather uncomfortable because it is the most hated truth in this world.  But there is no taking away from the biblical fact that hell is real, hell is torture, and hell is for sinners.

sermons.title: Honouring God In an Impossible Place
sermons.description: For the Scripture declares: â€œBut God chose the foolish things of the world to shame the wise; God chose the weak things of the world to shame the strong. God chose the lowly things of this world and the despised thingsâ€”and the things that are notâ€”to nullify the things that are, so that no one may boast before Him.â€ The question is, are we weak enough for God to call and use us? Are we empty of all the traditions of religious men so that we can learn from the Lord Himself? This is the way of the Lord. God is looking for a Gideonâ€™s army of those that are willing to trust fully in His power and not in any might or power of their own. God uses nobodies that will trust Him implicitly and fully. Are you going to be part of this Gideonâ€™s army today?

sermons.title: How To Receive A Clean Heart
Jehovah Shammah - The Lord is There
sermons.description: Ezekiel sees a vision of the glory of the Lord reluctantly departing from his idolatrous people and is grieved. Where the presence of the Lord is, there is a melting. It is dangerous to go to a church where the minister spends more time pursuing worldly methods, rather than spending time with God.

sermons.title: K-463 Death and Resurrection of Israel (1 of 2)
sermons.description: Speaking from Ezekiel 37, Art shows that the resurrection of Jesus has everything to do with a future fulfillment of a covenant promise made to the nation Israel, but only out of their own “death and resurrection.” A 1993 message.

sermons.title: K-464 Death and Resurrection of Israel (2 of 2)
sermons.description: Speaking from Ezekiel 37, Art shows that the resurrection of Jesus has everything to do with a future fulfillment of a covenant promise made to the nation Israel, but only out of their own “death and resurrection.” A 1993 message.

sermons.title: K-467 Godâ€™s Purpose for Israel and the Church
sermons.description: Speaking from Ezekiel 37, Art makes the point that present-day Israel, in its apostate condition, serves and will yet serve the purposes of God for the church. A 1991 message.

sermons.title: Life of Elijah - Part 4
sermons.description: This Elijah series is an excellent study on the life of Elijah. We see the blessings from his obedience and the results of his disobedience.  A perfect example for each of us to apply to our daily lives.

sermons.title: Men Whose Eyes Have Seen The King - Part 6
sermons.description: This message was delivered on 08/01/1959.

sermons.title: Men Whose Eyes Have Seen The King - Part 7
sermons.description: This message was delivered on 08/01/1959.

sermons.title: Missionary Commitment by Billy Graham
sermons.description: Billy Graham exhorts a large gathering of young people to count the count to follow Christ fully in missionary service. This is a prophetic message for our day to consider the true cost of following Christ and serving Him in missions. Oh that God would raise up a radical disciples in and end times radical missions movement in these last days.

sermons.title: New Life Baptist Church - Part 4
sermons.description: By taking us through the prophecies in the Old Testament, we see the riches of the New Covenant promises that are found there. To counter some false teachings, Paul teaches us how it is the great "I AM" who is sovereign in a believer's life, who completes the work towards conforming us to the image of His Son. It is not by our own merit or choices, but it is by His divine initiative and His divine fulfillment.

sermons.title: Passing Under the Rod
sermons.description: This is a message that will bring everyone that believes in Pentecost, under the rod. From the "Call to Repentance" conference in Tifton, Ga. in 1986. This sermon is from Ezek 20:33-40 and Ezek chapters 8-9, and examines the promise of God's judgment -- and his protection of those who "sigh and groan over all the abominations being committed in [Zion's] midst."

sermons.title: Regeneration & Self-Denial
sermons.description: Paul Washer explains how self-denial is more than a wearisome relinquishing of worldliness. Speaking with great passion, he shows how self-denial is a work of God that makes surrender a joy and delight. This message penetrates with prophetic urgency the need of true conversion under the power of God.

sermons.title: Regeneration And Self-Denial by Paul Washer
sermons.description: Paul Washer explains how self-denial is more than a wearisome relinquishing of worldliness. Speaking with great passion, he shows how self-denial is a work of God that makes surrender a joy and delight. This message penetrates with prophetic urgency the need of true conversion under the power of God.

sermons.title: Resurrection of the Dry Bones
sermons.description: Another examination of the classic text from Ezekiel 37 whereby the nation Israel is raised from its yet future “death” by a word spoken from another entity (the church) present with them at that time.

sermons.title: Revival - Rivers Of Living Water
sermons.description: We need to respond to the voice of God when he speaks! To ignore it is to lose unction. Abraham responded to God immediately when it came to sacrificing Isaac.  The word comes in power, not when it reaches our emotions, but when the voice of God through his word reaches the bedrock of our will.

sermons.title: Satan and Endtimes
sermons.description: In a departure from his usual hortatory preaching, Ravenhill-as-diabologist leads us through a biblical survey of the nature, power and final overthrow of Lucifer.

sermons.title: Sodom's Sister
sermons.description: This is a chilling message not for the weak or half-hearted, concerning pride of a nation and a people. When a nation becomes proud, then comes shame. Pride is an abomination to the Lord. Throughout history, God has judged nations for this, like Sodom, Gomorrah, Israel, and Judah, to name a few. How can America escape? This is a classic and heartfelt cry of the Watchman, warning one and all.

sermons.title: The Adversary In The Church by Milton Green
sermons.description: Milton Green shares a very strong penetrating message about the state of the church in the modern day. The devil and the powers of darkness have been having much control and infiltration into the church in the modern day. A much needed message to hear of things to come.

sermons.title: The Apostate Church In America: The Cappuccino Church
sermons.description: E.A. Johnston shares a powerful prophetic message on the state of the American Church and the current apostasy. He shares on how churches have been influenced by the world and the pulpits have lost the seriousness of the fear of the Lord. He states that churches can now damn people and not save them when they do not preach an pure gospel of Jesus Christ. The Gospel of the apostate church speaks of the gospel of comfortable christianity.

sermons.title: The Fall of Lucifer
sermons.description: Jesus saw Satan “fall from heaven like lightening,” but how could this perfect being, full of the love and goodness and truth of God take that first disastrous step down the path of sin? How could this magnificent leader in Heaven’s courts break fellowship with his closest allies such as Michael and Gabriel? It began, as all such evil careers begin, with a wayward thought that gained traction. A fascinating glimpse into the life in Heaven before Lucifer’s fall from grace.

sermons.title: The Final Warning Comes in Pictures
sermons.description: February 25, 2007 - God in His mercy will begin to speak to us through pictures. Think of the images the Lord has set before us in recent times. Images of the towers in New York City - symbols of pride and commerce that America trusts in, and in one hour they came crashing down. The Pentagon - the symbol of invincible strength, burned by fire. There are pictures in society in the news papers of people given to self gratification, addicted to drugs, obsessed with wealth, publicity and fame only to be lead to an early grave. Could it be the Lord is putting before us a picture of what we are becoming as a society. Thanks be to God that there are other pictures that God desires to use to show to society. If you are in a dungeon of darkness and despair God is preparing you to be a picture to this society. Pictures are developed in a dark room. God is calling the Church of Jesus Christ to come out of these dark places of despair to be the last picture of His love, mercy and faithfulness.

sermons.title: The Glory Of God And The Image Of Jealousy
sermons.description: This is a message about how God will not compete with idolatry for the hearts and minds of his people. Instead he will lift his glory from their lives. He reluctantly took his glory from Israel as illustrated in Ezekiel, and nobody even noticed, for the priests were busy with their secret things. Whatever you give your time and attention to the most is what is influencing your character and is becoming your idol. Too many go to church, going through the motions on Sunday and the rest of the week devote themselves to their own pursuits and pleasures and wonder why they can't feel God's presence. God desires to dwell among his people. But when they don't like to retain the knowledge of God, when they prefer an appearance of godliness with no power it will lead to destruction.

sermons.title: The Glory Of God Departing by Brian Long
The Great and Final Apostasy
sermons.description: August 20, 2006. There are some denominations that have forgotton their roots and forsaken the old paths adopting even the homosexual agenda. They preach a polluted and diluted gospel that no longer deals with the Blood of Jesus and the Cross. Many christains are given over to spirtual harlotry and sit comfortable in their sin without any desire to be convicted or corrected but rather prefer to hear smooth messages. In the midst of this wickedness God is going to move supernaturally by His Spirit and cause us to cease from this apostasy and harlotry. In these last days God will remember His coveanat and pour out His grace and mercy and redeem a people onto Himself.

sermons.title: The Heavenly Calling - Part 13
sermons.description: This message was delivered on 09/01/1963.

sermons.title: The Heaviness of Sin
sermons.description: Two issues, both serious are addressed. If you feel the heaviness of sin it is the mercy of God trying to draw you back to the cross so you can be saved from your sin. There are those who respond with remorse and repentance to this and those we do not because they have made peace with it. If you are sick of your sin, and weary of it, there is hope for God will never refuse a sincere heart. But if you are cold, and have no urgency to pray or read the word of God, no concern for the lost and are taking your sin lightly, you are on very dangerous ground. If you are being entertained by watching the sin of others on television, you are guilty of sin.

sermons.title: The Horizon Of Divine Purpose - Part 8
sermons.description: This message was delivered on 08/01/1961.

sermons.title: The Horizon of Divine Purpose - Part 1
sermons.description: This message was delivered on 08/01/1961.

sermons.title: The Image of God
sermons.description: October 21, 2007 - When the church of Jesus Christ begins to portray a wrong image of God, it opens the door for uncalled and unfaithful men to take positions as spiritual leaders. The end result of standing before the wrong image of God will lead the people into a theological perspective that is based on human optimism as opposed to sacrifice and truth. The true image of God represents Jesus Christ, the Cross , His sacrifice and all that is Holy. If we are going to know the true image of God, we will be led to a place where we are undone, where everything that we thought we were has to die. We must take joyfully the spoils of all of our religious goods and come before this image of the TRUE and Holy God. It is only in the presence of Jesus Christ that we are turned from image to image by the Glory of God.

sermons.title: The Indwelling Power of Holy Spirit
The Nature of God
sermons.description: God speaks to each generation in terms of their specific need, but He also speaks in terms of eternal principles.

sermons.title: The Nature of God (High Quality)
sermons.description: God speaks to each generation in terms of their specific need, but He also speaks in terms of eternal principles.

sermons.title: The Persistent Purpose Of God - Part 12
sermons.description: This message was delivered on 01/01/1965 at Taiwan, Republic Of China.

sermons.title: The Persistent Purpose Of God - Part 13
sermons.description: This message was delivered on 01/01/1965 at Taiwan, Republic Of China.

sermons.title: The Persistent Purpose Of God - Part 7
sermons.description: This message was delivered on 01/01/1965 at Taiwan, Republic Of China.

sermons.title: The River is Rising
sermons.description: August 27, 2006. The greatest awakening of the church is coming in supernatural power. God is going to pour out His spirit and revive a spirit of prayer starting in the pulpits. This river will begin to bring life wherever it goes.There will be a supernatural stirring of gifts of faith and evangelism that have been lying dormant. This river will reach homosexual communties and drug addicted people who are hungry and thirsty. We are destined for the greatest movement of the Holy Spirit and there will be a multtitude of fish represnting the greatest harvest we have ever seen. The only thing that can hinderv the river is unbelief.

sermons.title: The Solemn Assembly
sermons.description: Brother EA gives a powerful urgent plea for repentance in the Church in America. The manifest presence has left the corporate Church gatherings, we need to turn back to the Lord in fasting, praying and weeping. Like in the days of Ezekiel there are so many hidden sins yet they have a sense of worship in that day. This hypocrisy needs to be stopped and for us to pray for revival confessing our need. We need such a solemn assembly in our day.

sermons.title: The Sure Word of God, pt.2
The Wall is Down
sermons.description: David Wilkerson preaches this stirring message in a Camp Meeting for the Church of God (Cleveland, Tn.). This is a must hear for every Pastor and leader in every church across the world. God has been sending out clear warnings from many years of the need for the church to be seperate unto him in all holiness. Will we hear the call today?

sermons.title: The Wall is Down by David Wilkerson
sermons.description: David Wilkerson preaches this stirring message in a Camp Meeting for the Church of God (Cleveland, Tn.). This is a must hear for every Pastor and leader in every church across the world. God has been sending out clear warnings from many years of the need for the church to be seperate unto him in all holiness. Will we hear the call today?

sermons.title: The Wayward Church will Soon be Ashamed
sermons.description: Carter Conlon shares a prophetic message to the Wayward Church of North America. This is a powerful indictment and call of mercy from the heart of God towards all believers. May we be found in repentance and humility before God in these terrible last days.

sermons.title: Voices from Hell and What They Have to Say to America Today
Voices from Hell and What They Have to Say to America Today
